description: The disposition and allocation of annual Excess Revenues is governed by the 1986 amendment to the Settlement Agreement which defined the relationship between the Authority and the City of New York.

name: Excess Revenues for Battery Park City Authority (BPCA) Provided to NYC Annually: Beginning 1987
